```{r}
package_load <-
  function(x) {
    for (i in 1:length(x)) {
      if (!x[i] %in% installed.packages()) {
        install.packages(x[i])
      }
      library(x[i], character.only = TRUE)
    }
  }
```

## Create packages that I want to load

```{r}
packages = c("tidyverse", "palmerpenguins", "rmarkdown","ggthemes","RColorBrewer","viridis","ggdark","plotly", "rstatix")
```

## Load packages via string created above ^

```{r}
package_load(packages)
```
